Uses of Interface
com.qoppa.pdf.annotations.Annotation

  • Packages that use Annotation 
    Package Description
    com.qoppa.pdf.annotations
    Classes representing PDF annotations.
    com.qoppa.pdf.dom
    Classes representing the PDF document object model.
    com.qoppa.pdfProcess
    jPDFProcess main classes, used to manipulate PDF documents and pages.

      Methods in com.qoppa.pdf.annotations that return Annotation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Annotation AnnotationComponent.getAnnotation()
      Returns the annotation for this AnnotationComponent.
      Annotation Annotation.getIRTAnnotation()
      The annotation that this annotation is "in reply to." The relationship between the two annotations is either a group or a reply.
